description: Erection of a rear dormer roof extension together with a new rooflight at main roof level to replace the existing dormer window in the rear roofslope; replacement of all existing windows with new double glazed timber framed windows; replacement of existing French doors with new windows at first floor level, replacement of existing doors and windows with new sliding doors at ground floor level, and removal of existing staircase and balconies at the rear of the property; replacement of existing front entrance door with new double glazed timber framed door at upper ground floor level and existing front side entrance door with a new door at lower ground floor level; erection of a bike store at lower ground floor level and installation of new stone paving to external steps at the front of the property.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
